dependsOn.activity: If Max Iteration or DQ Failed

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
	(CASE WHEN ISJSON(C.ConnectionURL)=1 THEN REPLACE(JSON_VALUE(C.ConnectionURL,'$."Account URI"'),'/'+FD.Container,'') END) AS AccountURL
	,FD.Container
	,FD.FilePath
FROM Config.tblDQCheck AS DQ
INNER JOIN Config.tblfiledataset AS FD ON DQ.FiledatasetID = FD.FiledatasetID
INNER JOIN Config.tblConnection AS C ON FD.ConnectionID = C.ConnectionID
INNER JOIN Config.tblfiletypes AS F ON FD.Filetypeid = F.FiletypeID
WHERE DQ.JobID = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID}
AND DQ.IsActive = 1
OR FD.FileName = 'validation_email'

sink.preCopyScript:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [Config].[tblDQValidationStg]
CREATE TABLE [Config].[tblDQValidationStg]
(
	[JobId]          INT NOT NULL,
	[DQEntityId]     INT NOT NULL,
	[Status]         NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	[emailbody]      NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL,
	[IsActive]       INT NOT NULL,
	[ValidationTime] DATETIME NOT NULL
)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @JobId INT 
	,@ExecutionTypeNum INT
        ,@JobStartTime DATETIME

SET @JobId = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID}
SET @ExecutionTypeNum = @{pipeline().parameters.ExecutionTypeNum}

SELECT @JobStartTime = Starttime
FROM Config.tblCurrentExecution
WHERE JobId = @JobId
AND ExecutionType = 'Job'

IF EXISTS (SELECT
		*
	FROM Config.tblDQValidation DV
	INNER JOIN Config.tblDQCheck DC
		ON DV.JobId = DC.JobID
		AND DV.DQEntityId = DC.DQEntityId
	WHERE DV.JobId = @JobId
	AND DV.ValidationTime >= @JobStartTime
	AND (CASE WHEN DC.DQType = 'DQPreDelta' THEN 3 WHEN DC.DQType = 'DQPrePublish' THEN 5 END) = @ExecutionTypeNum
	AND DC.Typeofvalidation = 'Threshold'
	AND DV.DQValidation = 0)
BEGIN
	SELECT 0 AS DQValidation
END
ELSE IF EXISTS (SELECT
		*
	FROM Config.tblDQValidation DV
	INNER JOIN Config.tblDQCheck DC
		ON DV.JobId = DC.JobID
		AND DV.DQEntityId = DC.DQEntityId
	WHERE DV.JobId = @JobId
	AND DV.ValidationTime >= @JobStartTime
	AND (CASE WHEN DC.DQType = 'DQPreDelta' THEN 3 WHEN DC.DQType = 'DQPrePublish' THEN 5 END) = @ExecutionTypeNum
	AND DC.Typeofvalidation = 'Threshold'
	AND DV.DQValidation = -1)
BEGIN
	SELECT -1 AS DQValidation
END
ELSE
BEGIN
	SELECT 1 AS DQValidation
END

activities.name: If Max Iteration or DQ Failed

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @JobId INT
	,@ExecutionTypeNum INT
	,@ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(MAX)

SET @JobId = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID}
SET @ExecutionTypeNum = @{pipeline().parameters.ExecutionTypeNum}

SET @ErrorMessage = 'DQCheck is failed for JobId:'+CAST(@JobId AS NVARCHAR(10))+',ExecutionTypeNum:'+CAST(@ExecutionTypeNum AS NVARCHAR(10))

RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage,11,1)

SELECT 1 AS Num

defaultValue.CurrentQuery: Select case when Count(1)>0 then 'Y' else 'N' end AS Result from dbCommon.Reporting_ScorecardTargetsFact

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS PendingCount FROM Config.vwIntegrationMetadata WHERE ISExecute = 1 AND JobID = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID} AND [status]='Ready'

DECLARE @ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(MAX)

SET @ErrorMessage = '@{variables('ErrorMessage')}'

RAISERROR(@ErrorMessage,11,1)

SELECT 1 AS Num

SELECT DISTINCT TargetDBName
FROM Config.tblSparkEntities
WHERE JobID = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID}
AND IsActive = 1
AND IsSqlTable = 1

DECLARE @JobId INT

SET @JobId = @{pipeline().parameters.JobID}

UPDATE CE SET Status = 'Skipped',CE.ErrorMessage = 'Skipped due to MMS acquisition is skipped' 
FROM Config.tblCurrentExecution CE
INNER JOIN Config.tblIntegration I ON CE.JobId = I.JobId AND CE.ExecutionTypeId = I.IntegrationId
INNER JOIN Config.tblDQCheck DQ ON I.JobId = DQ.JobID AND I.ProcessingId = DQ.DQEntityId
CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(JSON_VALUE(DQ.Parameters,'$."SourceUnmanagedTables"'),',') UM
INNER JOIN Config.tblQuery Q ON UM.[value] = Q.SourceTableName
WHERE CE.JobId = @JobId
AND CE.ExecutionType = 'Integration'
AND DQ.Typeofvalidation = 'MMSComparison'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1
			FROM Config.tblCurrentExecution CEQ
			WHERE CEQ.JobId = CE.JobId
			AND CEQ.ExecutionTypeId = Q.QueryID
			AND CEQ.ExecutionType = 'Query'
			AND CEQ.Status = 'Skipped')

SELECT @@rowcount AS Cnt
